column4: BRIEF-Royce Value Trust Announces Terms For Its Common Stock Rights Offering

column7: * ROYCE VALUE TRUST- FIXED CLOSE OF BUSINESS MAY 30 AS RECORD DATE FOR DETERMINATION OF STOCKHOLDERS ENTITLED TO PARTICIPATE IN STOCK RIGHTS OFFERING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
